name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Testy McTest - Unique Email Address Generator

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple extension to generate unique (and customisable) email addresses for the purpose of form testing.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Just right-click on any input text field and you'll have the option to insert a unique test email address.

The extension uses a timestamp to ensure each email address is unique and is customisable.

Email Address Customisations:
- Prefix the email address so you can use your own address with a '+' modifier (so you can still receive emails, depending on your email provider).
- Choose a common domain, or use a custom one.

Example: myemail+20221104172905@gmail.com

I can imagine this extension will be useful to just a small few, so if it's useful to you, leave a rating and let me know.
